instruction: Create an excerpt from a journal entry that shows the protagonist reflecting on a significant experience from the past.
input: The protagonist is a 19-year-old whose dream job is to be a video game designer but is currently working as a cashier in a burger joint.
output: I looked up at the night sky filled with stars, marveling at their beauty and feeling the weight of the experience I had that day. As I reflected back on my working shift at the burger joint, I felt a mixture of frustration and determination to reach my dream of becoming a video game designer. I knew that I had to stay focused on my goal in order to make my dream a reality. Despite my current circumstances, I had faith that I could achieve that one day.
